channel.title: Comments on: Happy Birthday To Me. I’m 38
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3170/comment-page-1#comment-2013602">Lior</a>.
Thanks a lot, man! Indeed there were a lot of celebrations, presents and <del datetime="2015-01-25T14:10:25+00:00">candy</del> fruit :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lior.

Thanks a lot, man! Indeed there were a lot of celebrations, presents and candy fruit :)

item.title: By: Lior
item.dc:creator: Lior
item.description: Congrats man! Happy birthday, candy and presents! Go out and celebrate!
item.content:encoded:
Congrats man!
Happy birthday, candy and presents! Go out and celebrate!

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3170/comment-page-1#comment-2013600">Albert</a>.
Thanks a lot! :)

item.title: By: Albert
item.dc:creator: Albert
item.description: Congrats. Wish you the best of luck with the job and the partner. Hope you'll continue to always find your best with others and get the best out of them as well. No pressure ;-)
item.content:encoded:
Congrats.
Wish you the best of luck with the job and the partner.
Hope you’ll continue to always find your best with others and get the best out of them as well. No pressure ;-)
